scripts.make-test-db: dropdb --username=postgres --if-exists gins-test && createdb --username=postgres gins-test && psql -U postgres -d gins-test -f sql/schema.sql
scripts.reset-test-db: npm run make-test-db && npm run migrate-test && npm run seed-test
scripts.db-test: npm run reset-test-db && npm run test
